name: OverCut
description:
Hope you enjoy the game! 
Press  PAUSE button to see the controls

Use WASD to move Ty, Q to grab objects, E to start machines and R to throw objects

Use IJKLto move Timmy, U to grab objects, O to start machines and P to throw objects.

Special thanks to all these people for their assets:

https://gualtierisgg.itch.io/low-poly-rpg-bundle-low-poly-furniture-part-2

https://edlunn03.itch.io/low-poly-household-item-pack

https://www.mixamo.com/#/?page=1&query=timmy&type=Character → timmy

https://www.mixamo.com/#/?page=1&query=Ty&type=Character → ty

https://jackdotgriff.itch.io/low-poly-nature-assets → log pile

https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/low-poly-saw-e468f442be38467f987bfb4ea6da33b8 → saw

https://loudeyes.itch.io/paper-ui-pack-for-games → UI

https://gorlaks.itch.io/low-poly-carpenter-workbench → build bench

https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/low-poly-truck-72f57ee881e847d2876d44cbd5dee978 → truck

https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/jumpboost-arrow-fad95c37aaa240e49377edcfe2552ee7 → arrow
